title: Best purchase!
text: Vanessa flair has hands down the most reliable jewellery. I felt reassured seeing their 365 days guaranteed so decided to go through with it, needless to say they are Perfect! I've gotten so many compliments for every single one of my pieces.

title: Great company
text: Great company, they have delivered on being a great partner in business. I have been an ambassador with VanessaFlair for a few months, love it!

title: Def amazed with the products and the quality
text: Was amazed about the quality of the products. I've ordered 3 pieces of rings - 2 of them do not come off of my hands. It is amazing how comfortable they are. Another one is for special occasions only. Also I've ordered 1 necklace, 1 bracelet and 1 ring for my man. He keeps his ring on on his free days, because he says, that he doesn't want to scratch it. But, come on, he went to work with that ring (he works in a factory and there is a lot of manual work) and there was no scratch on the ring. As for another - way more expensive - visual scratches. The bracelet comes with me everywhere - to the shower, cooking meals, cleaning, exercizing. And I am amazed how well it stays :) I did not brake not a single time, whereas other ones broke the same day I've put them on. So I don't know about the other shoppers, but I am very pleased with the quality, the shipping, the communication and service of the Vanessa Flair team. I am deffinetely a satisfied customer. Also, Valentines and mothers' days are coming. Guess where I am going to look for nice presents? :)

text: The jewels are perfect and free from allergy,i am really sensitive and i wear a collar since 2 months and absolutely nothing bad happened to my skin and the jewel kept its brillance, and they are ajustables, i love them and the promotion system is really well thought, i m happy to be an ambassador of Vanessa Flair

title: The best jewels in the world
text: The best jewels in the world, I love all their designs, they are so exclusive, of the best quality and at a super affordable price, plus the shipping is super fast!

title: My experience was wonderful
text: My experience was wonderful, reaching excellent, especially when I bought SERENAfrom him, as the most important thing is that it is characterized by very high quality. Immediately, my friends did not hesitate to buy their wonderful product

title: I am obsessed with the VF jewelry!…
text: I am obsessed with the VF jewelry! Great quality and comfortable to wear.

title: Jewelry for fun and flair!
text: Lovely and delicate jewelry for every day design as well as evening dinners! The gold is a subtle and sparkly addition you will love!

title: I got so many compliments on the…
text: I got so many compliments on the jewelry. It is unique and beautiful!!!

title: I love them!
text: I love them!  Great quality and very shiny!

title: I absolutely love the product and it…
text: I absolutely love the product and it makes me so happy when people comment on how cute they are and I can say yes and they are water proof! People are always shocked! I wear the earring in the shower every day and it’s amazing! Thank you thank you!

title: Beautiful jewelry at an affordable…
text: Beautiful jewelry at an affordable price.

title: I love the jewelry piece that I…
text: I love the jewelry piece that I received.  It’s very well made and so beautiful. Wonderful quality.

title: In love
text: I absolutely love the three pieces I received. They feel like high quality jewelry. You don’t have to worry about these pieces turning your skin green. I have showered with these pieces and never had a problem with them like most other jewelry brands. I am not really a gold girl but the gold on these pieces are absolutely gorgeous. I wish I could rate these pieces a 10. I would recommend to anyone.

title: I love being an ambassador for Vanessa…
text: I love being an ambassador for Vanessa Flair!! I’ve received everything they’ve promised and the jewelry is very good quality! Ranee Gilbert
I love the jewelry. The gold is so pretty and amazing quality! 10/10!

title: Necklaces, Bracelets, and Rings...Oh My!
text: Received 3 pieces @vanessaflairjewellry and couldn't be happier! The quality and design of the ring, bracelet, and necklace exceeded my expectations. My new go to for all things jewelry.

title: Definitely recommend!
text: My order was promptly filled and delivered on time. The jewelry is beautiful and well made! Would definitely recommend!

title: Love the service
text: Love the service. Everything was easy and efficient during checkout as well as tracking and shipping. Totally in love :)

title: Amazing quality,very beautiful jewelry.
text: Date of experience: December 21, 2021

title: The delivery took a while but loved the…
text: The delivery took a while but loved the products once they were here! They are beautiful will defs get me into wearing gold more often!

title: This company has great customer…
text: This company has great customer service. I look forward to receiving my products!
